name: Dimora del Viaggiatore

reviews.text: We booked through Expedia 5 months in advance on a pay on arrival basis - the full payment was taken shortly afterwards and only acknowledged the day after we arrived. We booked 2 rooms as we were travelling with 2 adult nephews. On arrival we were informed the manager had decided it would be better if we shared one room. There was no other option as the other rooms were booked. The room was in poor condition with dodgy electrics and furniture that was falling apart. The breakfast we were offered was very poor and some items of doubtful age. After several emails and despite getting two acknowledgments and 2 receipts we failed to get a refund on our other room as the manager insisted the room we were in was tariffed as 145 euros - it wasnt worth one third of this. The property had no significant faclilities, wifi only worked right outside the office downstairs in the breakfast area which was infested with mosquitoes. Avoid this place like the plague - far and away the worst we have ever stayed at.
reviews.title: A shambles from start to finish

reviews.text: We stayed at Dimora del Viaggiatore 2, at number 157. According to reviews it was supposed to be a new, high standard place, and it was priced like one: we paid the same for beautiful places in Lago di Garda and Bergamo. It does not match the description.
reviews.title: 10 minutes from Verona center, but not what we expected

reviews.text: The appartment is located on an autostrada exit. While it simplifies getting into the city, it is noisy. The appartment has one bedroom and a kitchen/dining area with a sofa that can sleep two more. It was decorated with orange items, but felt shaby. Some of the kitchen utensils were missing and we had to go fetch them.
reviews.title: I would stay here again!

reviews.text: Overall the stay was not bad, but missed our expectations as were set by the advertisement and rate. If we had paid 30% less for it, i think we were probably satisfied.
reviews.title: Good location and value

reviews.text: Great accommodation. Great location - only about 10 mins by taxi to Verona's historical centre - but not walkable distance. Very friendly welcome. Only complaint I have is that the one room's shower didn't have hot water for some reason. But otherwise, we were very impressed.
reviews.title: AVOID THIS PLACE !!!!!

description: For what I paid, what I offer is a great deal for you, price for what you want is at least twice, or other desperate wish to give managers of hotels do it well, not my case, good day.
